name: Peppermint Milk Tea
altText: Classic milk tea infused with refreshing peppermint flavor.
reference: Teas N You. (2020). Sea salt [Photograph]. Teas N You. https://teasnyou.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/sea-salt.jpg

altText: Milk tea with a subtle ginger flavor, offering a warm and spicy kick.

name: Caramel Apple Milk Tea
